cart.name: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS
cart.description: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS is a battle royale shooter that pits 100 players against each other in a struggle for survival. Gather supplies and outwit your opponents to become the last person standing.

cart.name: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive
cart.description: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CS: GO) expands upon the team-based action gameplay that it pioneered when it was launched 19 years ago. CS: GO features new maps, characters, weapons, and game modes

cart.name: NARAKA: BLADEPOINT
cart.description: NARAKA: BLADEPOINT is a 60-player action combat offering players insane mobility powered by parkour and grappling hook, a vast arsenal of melee and ranged weapons, and a roster of characters with powerful abilitiesâ€”transform yourself into a gigantic Vajra Warrior and crush your enemies!
